Reviews.Title: beautiful celular,When someone calls the phone can be heard very well. The videos are super clear and the sound is great
Reviews.Author: Yolie
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this phone, really meets all described. Also is super to work with ATT go phone, simple mobile, T mobile.All the details of this cell here is true.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Ashnichole27
Reviews.Content: I recently was in the market for a new phone, because I had shattered the screen on my old one. After A LOT of research on different phones (and realizing how broke I was), I figured I would look into the off brand phones that I see a lot of on ebay and amazon all the time. After realizing that it's pretty much the same phone, just without a brand name, I decided to jump in and give it a try. I'm so glad I did! Not only did this phone cost my about 1/3 of the price of the brand name one, but it works just the same. I love it!!!! My only problem is that my front facing camera seems to be a little funny. The picture isn't as clear and doesn't focus. But the camera on the back of the phone works great! I have all the same apps as I had on my previous phone and they work perfectly. I am a t-mobile user and I inserted my sim card and it recognized it instantly. I have my google account set up to this phone as well. I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone who, like myself, is short on cash but in the market for a new phone. The brand name isn't always better. I love my phone so much it works great!!

Reviews.Title: It worked at first then died
Reviews.Author: Tara M. Grant "Tight C Las Vegas"
Reviews.Content: Had it for about 2 weeks and then a red flashing light came on and it died. I would not buy this item unless it is of some brand name

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT IS WHAT I EXPECTED

Reviews.Content: 1) in terms of the attention the seller clarify all the concerns I had regarding the product, answer any questions that you make, both the product and the shipping, I recommend it.2) The phone is expected is identical to NOTE II, brings all its accessories described in the publication.3) was performed successfully sent to U.S. CHINA to VENEZUELA U.S. and arrived in good condition before the stipulated timeLIU FRIEND THANKS FOR EVERYTHING.
